title: Let's Help Dennis Davis Make the Film​ "Pirsig's Journey"
description: Experienced filmmaker Dennis Davis and his producer Manola Carter are in pre-production of a film about the ZMM motorcycle trip called "Pirsig's Journey". If you want to see the philosophy of MOQ revived as well as preserving the trip on film before the landscape undergoes further changes, please contact Dennis at Pirsigsjourney.com
